column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I am stuck in Chicago for about a month due to a life saving surgery to remove a spinal tumor at Northwestern and to rehabilitate at Shirley Ryan AbilityLab.  Whenever I call the Neurosurgery department at Northwestern they also mention the Lou and Jeanne Malnati Brain Tumor institute so it's nice to see the founder and his wife of this popular Chicago pizza chain are doing such great lifesaving work.
